Terms of Service

Last Updated: November 23, 2024

1. Agreement to Terms

These Terms of Service ("Terms") constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Ez2Fix LLC ("Ez2Fix," "we," "us," or "our") governing your use of our website at ez2fix.com and our garage door repair and installation services.

By accessing or using our website or services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use our website or services.

2. Services Provided

Ez2Fix provides professional garage door repair, installation, and maintenance services in Northern New Jersey. Our services include but are not limited to:

  • Emergency garage door repair
  • Spring repair and replacement
  • Garage door opener installation and repair
  • New garage door installation
  • Cable repair and replacement
  • Panel replacement
  • Track repair and alignment
  • Preventive maintenance

All services are provided by licensed and insured technicians. NJ License #13VH13553300.

3. Service Requests and Appointments

3.1 Booking

You may request service by:

  • Submitting our online booking form
  • Calling (201) 554-6769
  • Emailing ez2fixllc@gmail.com

A service request does not constitute a confirmed appointment until you receive confirmation from Ez2Fix via phone or email.

3.2 Estimates

We provide free on-site estimates for all services. Estimates are valid for 30 days from the date of issuance. Final pricing may vary based on actual conditions discovered during service.

3.3 Service Area

We serve Essex County, Bergen County, Hudson County, Passaic County, Morris County counties in New Jersey. Service availability may vary by location.

3.4 Cancellations

You may cancel or reschedule appointments by contacting us at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice may be subject to a cancellation fee.

4. Payment Terms

4.1 Pricing

All prices are quoted in U.S. dollars. Pricing is subject to change without notice. You will be quoted a price before work begins, and you must approve the price before we proceed.

4.2 Payment Methods

We accept cash, check, and major credit cards. Payment is due upon completion of service unless other arrangements have been made in writing.

4.3 Late Payments

Unpaid balances more than 30 days overdue may be subject to a late fee of 1.5% per month (18% APR) or the maximum rate permitted by law, whichever is less.

5. Warranties and Guarantees

5.1 Workmanship Warranty

We guarantee our workmanship for a period of one (1) year from the date of service. If you experience any issues with our work within this period, we will repair or replace the work at no additional charge.

5.2 Parts Warranty

Parts installed by Ez2Fix are covered by the manufacturer's warranty. Warranty terms vary by manufacturer and will be provided at the time of service.

5.3 Installation Warranty

New garage door installations are covered by a ten (10) year warranty on parts and labor, subject to proper maintenance and normal use.

5.4 Warranty Exclusions

Warranties do not cover:

  • Damage caused by misuse, abuse, or negligence
  • Normal wear and tear
  • Damage from natural disasters or acts of God
  • Repairs or modifications performed by non-Ez2Fix personnel
  • Failure to perform recommended maintenance

6. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law:

  • Ez2Fix shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages
  • Our total liability for any claim arising out of or relating to these Terms or our services shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the specific service giving rise to the claim
  • We are not responsible for damage to property caused by pre-existing conditions or defects

Ez2Fix maintains general liability insurance as required by law.

7. Customer Responsibilities

As a customer, you agree to:

  • Provide accurate and complete information when requesting service
  • Ensure safe and clear access to the work area
  • Disclose any known hazards or issues with the garage door system
  • Follow all maintenance recommendations provided by our technicians
  • Make payment in full upon completion of service
  • Notify us immediately of any issues or concerns with completed work

8. Intellectual Property

All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Ez2Fix or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from any content on our website without our express written permission.

9. Privacy

Your use of our website and services is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our data practices.

10. Emergency Service Terms

Emergency services are available 24/7. Emergency service calls may be subject to additional fees. We will inform you of any additional charges before beginning work.

While we strive to respond to emergency calls as quickly as possible, response times may vary based on technician availability, weather conditions, and other factors beyond our control.

11. Dispute Resolution

11.1 Informal Resolution

If you have a dispute with Ez2Fix, please contact us first to attempt an informal resolution. We are committed to addressing customer concerns promptly and fairly.

11.2 Governing Law

These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New Jersey, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

11.3 Jurisdiction

Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or relating to these Terms shall be instituted in the state or federal courts located in New Jersey. You consent to the personal jurisdiction of such courts.

12. Modifications to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Terms on our website and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of our website or services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the modified Terms.

13. Severability

If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

14. Entire Agreement

These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Ez2Fix regarding your use of our website and services.

15. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
